All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
BaseConfig
Abstract base class for server configurations.
Client
The Client class simulates a client that connects to a server to retrieve file blocks.
Client.TokenInfo
Internal record to store token metadata used for trusted client transfers.
ClientConfig
Stores the client's configuration parameters for connecting to and interacting with the server.
FileStorage
Manages storage operations for the server or client, including file hashing, block retrieval, file saving, and writing client/server statistics.
RequestHandler
Handles a single client connection and processes file-related requests on the server side.
Server
The Server class represents the central file server.
ServerConfig
Holds server configuration parameters such as port, maximum number of parallel connections (Cs), probability of connection closure (P), frequency of closure attempts (T), and the directory for server files.
ServerFile
Represents metadata for a file served by the server.
Test
Utility launcher class for testing the system by starting the server and multiple clients.
TrustedClient
Represents a trusted client in the distributed file-sharing system.
